English: The Tower is filled with dangerous masquerpets. I understand if you do not wish to take the risk.
Vietnamese: Tower chứa đầy masquerpets nguy hiểm. Tôi hiểu bạn không muốn mạo hiểm.

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Catsy.
Vietnamese: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ rơi từ bất kỳ loại Catsy nào.

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Harpy.
Vietnamese: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ rơi ra từ bất kỳ loại Harpy nào.

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Gullah.
Vietnamese: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ rơi ra từ bất kỳ loại Gullah nào.

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Abraxas.
Vietnamese: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ giảm xuống từ bất kỳ loại Abraxas nào.

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Hague.
Vietnamese: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ giảm từ bất kỳ loại Hague nào.

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Asuras.

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the first floor of the Forsaken Tower.
Vietnamese: $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ đã được phát hiện ở tầng một của Forsaken Tower.

Vietnamese: $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ đã được phát hiện trên tầng hai của Forsaken Tower.

Vietnamese: $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ đã được phát hiện trên tầng ba của Forsaken Tower.

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the fourth floor of the Forsaken Tower.
Vietnamese: $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ đã được phát hiện trên tầng thứ tư của Forsaken Tower.

Vietnamese: $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ đã được phát hiện trên tầng năm của Forsaken Tower.

English: Forsaken Tower Daily Quests
Vietnamese: Nhiệm vụ hằng ngày Forsaken Tower

English: Dungeon Card Reward
Vietnamese: Dungeon Card Reward

English: Weapon Piercing Box (D)
Vietnamese: Weapon Piercing Box (D)

English: Weapon Piercing Box (C)
Vietnamese: Weapon Piercing Box (C)

English: Weapon Piercing Box (B)
Vietnamese: Weapon Piercing Box (B)

English: Weapon Piercing Box (A)
Vietnamese: Weapon Piercing Box (A)

English: Welcome hero! Another request has come in to clear out the boss masquerpets within Madrigal's dungeons. Could you please slay 5 dungeon bosses, and return to me once you are done?
Vietnamese: Xin chào người hùng! Có một nhiệm vụ khác yêu cầu dọn sạch trùm masquerpets ẩn náu trong ngục tối của Madrigal. Bạn có thể giết 5 Dungeon Boss và quay lại chỗ tôi khi xong việc không?

English: Welcome hero! Another request has come in to clear out the boss masquerpets within Madrigal's dungeons. Could you please slay 20 dungeon bosses on Hard or higher difficulty, and return to me once you are done?
Vietnamese: Xin chào người hùng! Có một nhiệm vụ khác yêu cầu dọn sạch trùm masquerpets ẩn náu trong ngục tối của Madrigal. Bạn có thể giết 20 trùm ngục tối ở mức độ Hard hoặc cao hơn và quay lại chỗ tôi khi xong việc không?

English: Welcome hero! Another request has come in to clear out the boss masquerpets within Madrigal's dungeons. Could you please slay 35 dungeon bosses on Extra Hard or higher difficulty, and return to me once you are done?
Vietnamese: Xin chào người hùng! Có một nhiệm vụ khác yêu cầu dọn sạch trùm masquerpets ẩn náu trong ngục tối của Madrigal. Bạn có thể giết 35 trùm ngục tối ở mức độ Extra Hard hoặc cao hơn và quay lại chỗ tôi khi xong việc không?

English: Welcome hero! Another request has come in to clear out the boss masquerpets within Madrigal's dungeons. Could you please slay 50 dungeon bosses on Nightmare or higher difficulty, and return to me once you are done?
Vietnamese: Xin chào người hùng! Có một nhiệm vụ khác yêu cầu dọn sạch trùm masquerpets ẩn náu trong ngục tối của Madrigal. Bạn có thể giết 50 trùm ngục tối ở mức độ Nightmare hoặc cao hơn và quay lại chỗ tôi khi xong việc không?

English: Collect souls from boss masquerpets at the end of any dungeon 5 times, and return to me for a reward.
Vietnamese: Thu thập linh hồn của trùm masquerpet ở cuối hầm ngục tối 5 lần và quay lại chỗ tôi để nhận thưởng.

English: Collect souls from boss masquerpets at the end of any dungeon on Hard or higher difficulty 20 times, and return to me for a reward.
Vietnamese: Thu thập linh hồn của trùm masquerpet mức độ Hard hoặc cao hơn ở cuối hầm ngục tối 20 lần và quay lại chỗ tôi để nhận thưởng.

English: Collect souls from boss masquerpets at the end of any dungeon on Extra Hard or higher difficulty 35 times, and return to me for a reward.
Vietnamese: Thu thập linh hồn của trùm masquerpet mức độ Extra Hard hoặc cao hơn ở cuối hầm ngục tối 35 lần và quay lại chỗ tôi để nhận thưởng.

English: Collect souls from boss masquerpets at the end of any dungeon on Nightmare or higher difficulty 50 times, and return to me for a reward.
Vietnamese: Thu thập linh hồn của trùm masquerpet mức độ Nightmare hoặc cao hơn ở cuối hầm ngục tối 35 lần và quay lại chỗ tôi để nhận thưởng.

English: The dungeons are filled with dangerous masquerpets. I understand if you do not wish to take the risk.
Vietnamese: Những hầm ngục đầy rẫy đám masquerpet nguy hiểm. Tôi hiểu nếu bạn không muốn chấp nhận rủi ro này.

English: The threat from within the dungeons has been reduced thanks to you, hero. Please accept a weapon piercing card as thanks for your efforts!
Vietnamese: Mối đe dọa từ bên trong hầm ngục đã giảm đi nhiều nhờ có bạn đấy, người hùng. Xin hãy nhận một thẻ xuyên vũ khí như một lời cảm ơn vì những nỗ lực của bạn!

English: You haven't defeated the bosses yet? That's okay, just return once you have.
Vietnamese: Bạn chưa hạ gục đám trùm quái vật đó à? Không sao cả, quay lại đây khi bạn đã làm xong nhé.

English: Collect souls from 5 dungeon bosses on any difficulty.
Vietnamese: Thu thập linh hồn từ 5 Dungeon Bosses ở bất kỳ độ khó nào.

English: Collect souls from 20 dungeon bosses on Hard or higher difficulty.
Vietnamese: Thu thập linh hồn từ 20 Dungeon Bosses với mức độ từ Khó trở lên.

English: Collect souls from 35 dungeon bosses on Extra Hard or higher difficulty.
Vietnamese: Thu thập linh hồn từ 25 Dungeon Bosses ở mức độ từ Extra Hard trở lên.

English: Collect souls from 50 dungeon bosses on Nightmare difficulty.
Vietnamese: Thu thập linh hồn từ 50 Dungeon Bosses ở độ khó Nightmare.

English: Daily Quests
Vietnamese: Nhiệm vụ hàng ngày

English: Saving Private Leo
Vietnamese: Giải cứu Binh Nhì Leo

English: Private Leo has been trapped in the dungeon and sent an SOS sign!\nPlease save Private Leo!
Vietnamese: Binh Nhì Leo đã bị mắc kẹt trong ngục tối và đã gửi tín hiệu SOS!\nHãy giải cứu Binh Nhì Leo!

English: Private Leo seems to be injured so please hurry!
Vietnamese: Binh Nhì Leo có vẻ như bị thương rồi, phải cứu cậu ấy nhanh lên!

English: I have misjudged you! I’ll look for another person, now begone!
Vietnamese: Tôi đã đánh giá sai về bạn! Tôi sẽ tìm người khác, còn bạn thì đi đi!

English: I've heard Private Leo has been successfully rescued! Please accept this reward!
Vietnamese: Tôi nghe nói Binh nhì Leo đã được bạn giải cứu thành công! Xin hãy chấp nhận phần thưởng này!

English: Has Private Leo been rescued yet?
Vietnamese: Binh nhì Leo đã được giải cứu chưa nhỉ?

English: Visit dungeon NPC to learn all about Event
Vietnamese: Hãy tìm gặp NPC của ngục tối để biết thêm thông tin về Sự kiện

English: Rescue the missing childrens
Vietnamese: Giải cứu những đứa trẻ bị mất tích

English: The children from the town have gone missing... Please rescue them from the monsters!
Vietnamese: Những đứa trẻ trong thị trấn đang dần bị mất tích 1 cách kỳ lạ... Xin hãy cứu lấy bọn trẻ khỏi lũ quái vật!

English: I need you to save $QUEST_END_TRIGGERCTRL_COUNT$ childrens in any dungeon, before midnight.
Vietnamese: Trước nửa đêm, tôi cần bạn cứu lấy $QUEST_END_TRIGGERCTRL_COUNT$ đứa trẻ trong bất kỳ ngục tối nào.

English: You can find childrens in any dungeon. They will be in a cage and you will just have to get the key from the boss to save them!
Vietnamese: Bạn có thể tìm thấy những đứa trẻ trong bất kỳ ngục tối nào. Bọn trẻ sẽ bị nhốt trong một cái cũi và bạn phải đoạt lấy chìa khóa từ các Dungeon Boss để cứu chúng ra.

English: If I'm right, children's lives don't matter to you? No problem.
Vietnamese: Nếu đúng như tôi nghĩ thì sinh mạng của những đứa trẻ có vẻ chẳng có ý nghĩa gì đối với bạn đúng không? Chả sao cả.

English: You saved the childrens! Thank you very much, you're my hero!
Vietnamese: Bạn đã cứu những đứa trẻ! Cảm ơn bạn rất nhiều, bạn là người hùng của chúng tôi!

English: Someone else saved them. You were too slow and incompetent.
Vietnamese: Đã có người khác cứu được bọn trẻ rồi. Bạn đã chậm 1 bước.

English: I need to rescue $QUEST_END_TRIGGERCTRL_COUNT$ childrens in any dungeon by midnight.
Vietnamese: Tôi cần phải cứu $QUEST_END_TRIGGERCTRL_COUNT$ đứa trẻ trong bất kì ngục tối nào trước nửa đêm.

English: Make Monster Shaved Ice
Vietnamese: Hãy làm món Monster Shaved Ice

English: It's definitely hot today.\nThere's a special food that can blow this heat away, do you want to know?
Vietnamese: Thời tiết hôm nay thật nóng.\nCó một món ăn đặc biệt có thể thổi bay đi sự oi bức này, bạn có muốn thử không?

English: Don't be surprised! It's Monster Shaved Ice!\nIt's a special recipe by me with monster ingredients.\nIf you want know how it tastes, go find the ingredients before the ice melts!
Vietnamese: Đừng ngạc nhiên nhé! Đó là món Monster Shaved Ice!\nMột món ăn với công thức độc quyền do chính tôi sáng tạo ra, dùng nguyên liệu là các con quái vật đấy.\nNếu bạn muốn nếm thử hương vị đặc biệt này, hãy đi tìm các nguyên liệu khác trước khi những viên băng này bị tan chảy!

English: You're not curious? You must not be too hot...
Vietnamese: Bạn không tò mò à? Chắc bạn không thấy nóng lắm nhỉ...

English: Here you go! Hurry up and try it before it melts!
Vietnamese: Của bạn đây! Hãy ăn thử nhanh lên, không thì nó sẽ chảy mất!

English: Oh why are you so late? Your ice already melted and it can't be used...
Vietnamese: Oh sao bạn lại đến trễ thế? Viên băng của bạn bị chảy và không thể dùng được nữa rồi...

English: Are you still collecting?\nIf the ice melts, we can't make the shaved ice so hurry up!
Vietnamese: Bạn vẫn đang thu thập những viên băng chứ?\nNếu băng tan thì chúng ta không thể làm đá bào được nên nhanh tay lên nhé!

English: Defeat the monsters before the ice metls and return to Sotta\n(Can redo the quest if failed)
Vietnamese: Đánh bại lũ quái vật trước khi băng tan và đưa lại những viên băng cho Sotta nhé.\n(Bạn có thể làm lại nhiệm vụ nếu thất bại)

English: Coral Island
Vietnamese: Coral Island

English: Clouds Over Coral Island
Vietnamese: Clouds Over Coral Island

English: Hero, the clouds over the island to the southeast have finally cleared!
Vietnamese: Hero, những đám mây trên hòn đảo phía đông nam cuối cùng đã tan!

English: For the longest time we have been unable to travel to the famed Coral Island. I wonder who or what caused the clouds to dissipate?
Vietnamese: Đã lâu rồi chúng tôi không thể đến Đảo San Hô nổi tiếng. Tôi tự hỏi ai hoặc cái gì đã khiến mây tan?

English: Regardless of the reason, perhaps you should go pay a visit to the island and see what's new.
Vietnamese: Bất kể lý do là gì, có lẽ bạn nên đến thăm hòn đảo và xem có gì mới.

English: Many years ago a skilled blacksmith from Darken City named BoBu traveled through the fog in search for rare materials. Go seek out Coral Island and see if BoBu managed to survive.
Vietnamese: Nhiều năm trước, một thợ rèn lành nghề đến từ Thành phố Darken tên là BoBu đã du hành xuyên qua sương mù để tìm kiếm những vật liệu quý hiếm. Hãy đi tìm Đảo San Hô và xem liệu BoBu có sống sót được không.

English: I understand hero, Coral Island has been uncharted territory for many years... Come back to me if you change your mind.
Vietnamese: Tôi hiểu hero, Coral Island đã là lãnh thổ chưa được khám phá trong nhiều năm... Hãy quay lại với tôi nếu bạn thay đổi ý định.

English: Hello there traveler, I didn't expect to see one of you so soon after the clouds around Coral Island were lifted...
Vietnamese: Xin chào du khách, tôi không ngờ sẽ gặp lại một trong số các bạn ngay sau khi mây mù quanh Coral Island tan đi...

English: Go seek out Coral Island and see if BoBu managed to survive.
Vietnamese: Hãy đi tìm Coral Island và xem liệu BoBu có sống sót được không.

English: Find Your Bearings
Vietnamese: Tìm Bearings của bạn

English: Long ago I sailed into the mist that surrounded this island, hoping to discover something new and untouched in the land of Madrigal.
Vietnamese: Cách đây rất lâu, tôi đã đi thuyền vào màn sương mù bao quanh hòn đảo này, với hy vọng khám phá được điều gì đó mới mẻ và hoang sơ ở vùng đất Madrigal.

English: I found Coral Island nestled deep into the clouds, but something kept me from ever leaving.
Vietnamese: Tôi thấy Coral Island ẩn sâu trong mây, nhưng có điều gì đó khiến tôi không thể rời đi.

English: The mist that covered the island held some magic that prevented those who arrived from escaping.
Vietnamese: Màn sương mù bao phủ hòn đảo mang một loại phép thuật ngăn cản những người đến trốn thoát khỏi hòn đảo.

English: With Coral Island open to all, we may begin seeing more travelers arrive over time. For now, go introduce yourself to Sunny Pang. Sunny Pang will help you in your adventures around the island.
Vietnamese: Với việc Coral Island mở cửa cho tất cả mọi người, chúng ta có thể dân thấy nhiều du khách đến tham quan hòn đảo hơn. Còn bây giờ, hãy giới thiệu bản thân bạn với Sunny Pang. Sunny Pang sẽ giúp bạn trong cuộc phiêu lưu trên hòn đảo thú vị này.

English: Take your time, the island has a lot to offer. Come back to me when you are ready.
Vietnamese: Từ từ khám phá nhé, hòn đảo có rất nhiều thứ đang chờ bạn tìm ra. Hãy quay lại với tôi khi bạn đã sẵn sàng cho điều khác.

English: Wow, it's a real adventure! It's been so long since we've had anyone come visit Coral Island. I wasn't sure this day would ever come!
Vietnamese: Wow, đó thực sự là một cuộc phiêu lưu đấy! Vì lâu lắm rồi mới có người đến thăm Coral Island, tôi còn không chắc ngày này sẽ đến nữa cơ!

English: Introduce yourself to Sunny Pang.
Vietnamese: Giới thiệu bản thân bạn với Sunny Pang.

English: An Island Shrouded in Mystery
Vietnamese: Một hòn đảo được bao phủ trong bí ẩn

English: Those who call Coral Island their home have been unable to explore the world due to a curse placed on the island many years ago.
Vietnamese: Những người gọi Coral Island là nhà của họ đã không thể khám phá thế giới do lời nguyền bị đặt lên hòn đảo này nhiều năm trước.

English: The cause of the cursed mist that has kept the Coral Island inhabitants trapped is unknown.
Vietnamese: Người ta vẫn chưa biết nguyên nhân của màn sương mù đáng nguyền rủa đã khiến cư dân Coral Island bị mắc kẹt lại này.

English: However with the mist cleared from around the island, we can finally welcome fresh new faces to help us defend our small village!
Vietnamese: Tuy nhiên, khi sương mù bao quanh hòn đảo đã tan đi, chúng ta cuối cùng cũng có thể chào đón những gương mặt mới, họ có thể giúp chúng ta bảo vệ ngôi làng nhỏ này!

English: Coral Island is a dangerous place. To prove you are an adventurer capable of surviving the dangers here, I want you to go explore the island and take down 200 of any kind of Atrox.
Vietnamese: Coral Island là một nơi nguy hiểm. Để chứng minh bạn là một nhà thám hiểm có khả năng sống sót qua những nguy hiểm ở đây, tôi muốn bạn đi khám phá hòn đảo và hạ gục 200 loại Atrox bất kỳ.

English: We didn't expect everyone that arrived to be strong enough for this place. Perhaps you can return to Darken City.
Vietnamese: Chúng tôi cũng không hy vọng tất cả những người đến đây đều đủ mạnh mẽ để sống sót tại nơi này. Có lẽ bạn nên quay lại Darken City.

English: I am impressed! Atrox are dangerous beasts known to cut down most creatures that approach them. You have proven yourself.
Vietnamese: Tôi rất ấn tượng! Atrox là những con thú nguy hiểm có khả năng tiêu diệt hầu hết những sinh vật tiếp cận chúng. Bạn đã chứng minh được khả năng của mình.

English: Atrox are dangerous foes, you'll need to successfully defeat more of them to prove yourself to me.
Vietnamese: Atrox là những kẻ nguy hiểm, bạn sẽ cần phải tiêu diệt nhiều con Atrox hơn để cho tối thấy năng lực của bạn.

English: Defeat 200 of any kind of Atrox, then return to Sunny Pang.
Vietnamese: Tiêu diệt 200 con Atrox bất kỳ, sau đó quay trở lại tìm Sunny Pang.

English: Clear the Paths
Vietnamese: Dọn đường

English: Word has been going around the village about a strong new visitor that can hold their own against the ferocities of Coral Island.
Vietnamese: Tin đồn đã lan truyền khắp làng về một vị khách mạnh mẽ có thể tự mình chống lại sự hiểm ác của Coral Island.

English: The number of Tigars on the island have exploded recently, and we're not sure why. It's hardly safe to walk along the paths of Coral Island anymore.
Vietnamese: Số lượng Tigars trên đảo dạo gần đây đã bùng nổ, và chúng tôi không rõ tại sao. Việc đi bộ dọc theo các con đường ở Coral Island hầu như không còn an toàn nữa.

English: If you are willing to help us, go hunt enough Tigars to keep our paths safe for a while. Around 300 should do.
Vietnamese: Nếu bạn sẵn lòng giúp đỡ chúng tôi, hãy giúp chúng tôi săn những con Tigars. Có lẽ tiêu diệt 300 con có thể sẽ giữ đường đi của chúng tôi an toàn trong một khoảng thời gian.

English: Perhaps no one is powerful enough to defeat the Tigars.
Vietnamese: Có lẽ không có ai đủ mạnh để tiêu diệt những con Tigar.

English: Incredible, thank you for your efforts! We can safely travel around the land paths of the island again.
Vietnamese: Thật không thể tin được, cảm ơn sự cố gắng và công sức của bạn! Cuối cùng thì chúng tội cũng có thể đi trên các con đường của hòn đảo một cách an toàn rồi.

English: Tigars hide in the grass, waiting to strike their prey. In just one NaNosecond they pounce to attack.
Vietnamese: Tigars ẩn mình sâu trong các bãi cỏ, chờ đợi để vồ lấy con mồi. Chỉ trong tíc tắc, chúng có thể tấn công bạn bất cứ lúc nào.

English: Defeat 300 of any kind of Tigar, then return to Talus.
Vietnamese: Hãy tiêu diệu 300 Tigar bất kỳ và quay lại gặp Talus khi bạn đã hoàn thành.

English: Pirates and Their Pet
Vietnamese: Cướp biển và thú cưng của họ

English: Your reputation continues to grow in our little village, hero!
Vietnamese: Danh tiếng của bạn bắt đầu lan dần khắp ngôi làng nhỏ của chúng tôi rồi đầy người hùng!

English: The Meral pirates of Coral Island have managed to tame a Lord Tigar. Those thieves have threatened to come rob and destroy our homes.
Vietnamese: The Meral pirates of Coral Island have managed to tame a Lord Tigar. Those thieves have threatened to come rob and destroy our homes.

English: Defeat the pirates and their gigantic pet before they destroy everything we've built!
Vietnamese: Đánh bại lũ cướp biển và con thú khổng lồ của chúng trước khi bọn chúng phá hủy tất cả những gì chúng tôi đã xây dựng!

English: I wouldn't want to be eaten by a Lord Tigar either. Understandable.
Vietnamese: I wouldn't want to be eaten by a Lord Tigar either. Understandable.

English: I knew you could do it, hero! For now we can rest, knowing that our village is safe from the Meral pirates and their Lord Tigar!
Vietnamese: I knew you could do it, hero! For now we can rest, knowing that our village is safe from the Meral pirates and their Lord Tigar!

English: Merals and their pet Tigar are terribly powerful. You'll need to be strong to defeat them.
Vietnamese: Lũ Meral và con thú Tigar của chúng cực kỳ đáng gờm. Bạn cần phải đủ mạnh mới đánh bại được chúng.

English: Collect 30 Pristine Pirate Lens from any kind of Meral, and a Gigantic Feline Fang from a Lord Tigar.
Vietnamese: Collect 30 Pristine Pirate Lens from any kind of Meral, and a Gigantic Feline Fang from a Lord Tigar.

English: King of the Pirates!
Vietnamese: Vua Cướp biển!

English: Woaw, welcome to Coral Island hero! Let me tell you a story of legend, if you don't mind.
Vietnamese: Woa, chào mừng đến Coral Island nhé người hùng! Nếu không phiền thì để tôi kể bạn nghe về một truyền thuyết nhé.

English: Long ago, a huge Meral was once blessed by Shade. The Meral grew twisted and grotesque, but filled with dark power.
Vietnamese: Từ rất lâu về trước, có một Meral to lớn được Shade phù phép. Meral này trở nên biến dạng và méo mó, nhưng hùng mạnh với phép thuật bóng tối trào dâng trong cơ thể.

English: Soon the Overlord Meral became the King of the Pirates of Coral Island, ruling with an iron hook.
Vietnamese: Soon the Overlord Meral became the King of the Pirates of Coral Island, ruling with an iron hook.

English: Wehehehe, if you defeated that Overlord Meral maybe YOU could become King of the Pirates!
Vietnamese: Wehehehe, if you defeated that Overlord Meral maybe YOU could become King of the Pirates!

English: I guess we will never know if the legend of the Meral King is true.
Vietnamese: Tôi đoán ta sẽ không bao giờ biết được truyền thuyết về Vua Meral có thật hay không.

English: Woah woah woah! You defeated the King of the Pirates? And that stone...
Vietnamese: Woah woah woah! Bạn đánh bại Vua Cướp biển rồi sao? Còn viên đá kia...

English: It seems this one piece of stone is filled with purple magic... this is definitely the work of Shade.
Vietnamese: Dường như một mảnh của viên đá này tràn đầy lam thuật...đây chắc chắn là tác phẩm của Shade.

English: Fufufu, the only thing that bothers me is that there is legend of a second piece of magic stone hidden on this island. Maybe one day the two of us will discover where it's hiding!
Vietnamese: Fufufu, điều duy nhất làm tôi băn khoăn là truyền thuyết về một mảnh thứ hai của viên đá phép thuật được giấu trên hòn đảo này. Có lẽ một ngày nào đó hai chúng ta sẽ khám phá ra được nơi nó được cất giấu!

English: To find out if the legend is true, you'll need to defeat the Overlord Meral.
Vietnamese: To find out if the legend is true, you'll need to defeat the Overlord Meral.

English: Defeat the Overlord Meral to collect the Purple Pirate Insignia.
Vietnamese: Defeat the Overlord Meral to collect the Purple Pirate Insignia.

English: Island Delicacies
Vietnamese: Tinh hoa của Đảo

English: Ha! You have really made a name for yourself here on Coral Island, hero. Everyone has told me of the amazing feats you've accomplished.
Vietnamese: Ha! Bạn thật sự đã xây dựng được danh tiếng trên Coral Island này đấy, người hùng. Mọi người đã kể tôi nghe về những việc phi thường bạn đã hoàn thành.

English: If you want to prove yourself further, help us defeat the legion of Naga that have taken over the island.
Vietnamese: Nếu bạn muốn chứng minh mình có khả năng nhiều hơn thế, hãy giúp chúng tôi đánh bại quân đoàn của Naga, những tên đã xâm chiếm hòn đảo.

English: To safely take on the Naga, first you'll need to gather bait made of their favorite foods. You can make bait from any type of Kingster or Creper! Meet up with Pau Pau and he'll prepare everything.
Vietnamese: Để hạ gục Naga một cách an toàn, trước tiên bạn cần thu thập mồi nhử làm từ những loại thực phẩm yêu thích của chúng. Bạn có thể làm mồi từ bất kỳ loại Kingster hoặc Creper nào! Gặp Pau Pau và anh ấy sẽ chuẩn bị mọi thứ giúp bạn.

English: Everyone's adventure comes to a close one day. That's alright, hero.
Vietnamese: Cuộc phiêu lưu nào rồi cũng sẽ đến hồi kết. Không sao đâu, anh hùng ạ.

English: Woaw, nice job hero! We can make plenty of bait with all this to lower the guard of the Naga! For now, take a rest. We'll make a plan of attack later.
Vietnamese: Wow, làm tốt lắm người anh hùng! Chúng ta có thể tạo ra rất nhiều mồi nhử với tất cả những thứ này để thu hút sự cảnh giác của Naga! Bây giờ hãy nghỉ ngơi đi. Chúng ta sẽ lên kế hoạch tấn công sau.

English: Keep fighting Kingster or Creper until you've found enough bait.
Vietnamese: Hãy tiếp tục tiêu diệt Kingster hoặc Creper cho đến khi bạn thu thập đủ mồi nhử.

English: Defeat any kind of Kingster or Creper until you've made 200 Island Bait.
Vietnamese: Tiêu diệt bất kỳ loại Kingster hoặc Creper nào cho đến khi bạn thu thập được 200 Island Bait.

English: Lizard People
Vietnamese: Lizard People

English: I hope you're feeling rested after making all that bait with Pau Pau!
Vietnamese: Tôi mong bạn cảm thấy được nghỉ ngơi sau khi làm xong đống mồi đó cùng Pau Pau!

English: It's time to go on the offensive and take down as many of the Naga as we can.
Vietnamese: Đã đến lúc bật chế độ tấn công và hạ gục càng nhiều Naga càng tốt.

English: Okay hero, go out there and defeat the Naga before they come eat us!
Vietnamese: Được rồi anh hùng, hãy ra ngoài đó và đánh bại những con Naga trước khi chúng đến và xử chúng ta thành bữa tối!

English: The Naga are ferocious, there's no shame in saying no.
Vietnamese: Những con Naga rất hung dữ, không có gì đáng xấu hổ khi bạn chọn nói không.

English: Incredible! Truly amazing! You've conquered the Naga, and nearly all of Coral Island!
Vietnamese: Đáng kinh ngạc! Thật sự tuyệt vời! Bạn đã quét sạch hết bọn Naga và gần như là toàn bộ Coral Island!

English: Hopefully soon our village can sleep without keeping one eye open.
Vietnamese: Mong rằng ngày mà dân làng chúng tôi có thể nhắm mắt ngủ yên hằng đêm sẽ sớm đến.

English: Keep going! You need to defeat more Naga.
Vietnamese: Cố gắng lên! Bạn cần phải đánh bại nhiều Naga hơn nữa.

English: Collect evidence of defeating at least 1000 Small Naga, Naga, or Captain Naga. After that, defeat the Lord Naga and Overlord Naga.
Vietnamese: Collect evidence of defeating at least 1000 Small Naga, Naga, or Captain Naga. After that, defeat the Lord Naga and Overlord Naga.

English: Mission Improbable
Vietnamese: Nhiệm vụ không thể thực hiện được

English: Hahaha! I cannot thank you enough for all that you have done for our village, hero! Only the most powerful of masquerpets remain a threat to our village now.
Vietnamese: Hahaha! Tôi không biết phải nói bao nhiêu lời cảm ơn mới đủ cho tất cả những gì bạn đã làm vì làng chúng tôi, anh hùng ạ! Bây giờ chỉ còn bọn masquerpets mạnh nhất vẫn là mối đe dọa cho ngôi làng.

English: We rarely see the Dorian and Okean creatures approach the village. However with so many other Island evils defeated, I fear they may leave their lair to take advantage of the situation!
Vietnamese: Chúng tôi hiếm khi thấy Dorian và Okean tiếp cận ngôi làng. Tuy nhiên, vì rất nhiều quái vật độc ác trên đảo đang dần bị tiêu diệt , tôi sợ chúng có thể rời khỏi hang ổ của mình để lợi dụng tình hình này!

English: Go seek out where the Dorian and Okean live. We'll need as much information as we can get if we expect to defeat them!
Vietnamese: Hãy đi tìm nơi Dorian và Okean đang trú ngụ. Chúng ta sẽ cần nhiều thông tin nhất có thể nếu muốn đánh bại chúng!

English: What!? You can't possibly be scared of a few more masquerpets after all we've been through together!
Vietnamese: Gì cơ!? Không thể nào có chuyện bạn sợ phải đối mặt với thêm vài con masquerpet sau mọi chuyện chúng ta đã cùng trải qua chứ!

English: Well done, hero! With this information we have a chance to defeat the Dorian and Okean before they can attack!
Vietnamese: Tốt lắm, người hùng! Với thông tin này chúng ta có cơ hội đánh bại loài Dorian và Okean trước khi chúng tấn công!

English: Keep searching, the Dorian and Okean make their homes in the waters of Coral Island.
Vietnamese: Tiếp tục tìm kiếm đi, loài Dorian và Okean xây nhà của bọn chúng ở vùng nước của Đảo San hô.

English: Search for where the Dorian and Okean live.
Vietnamese: Tìm nơi ở của loài Dorian và Okean.

English: Surprise Attack!
Vietnamese: Surprise Attack!

English: HOOWAH! I'm trembling with excitement!
Vietnamese: HOOWAH! Tôi run lên vì phấn khích!

English: With the information you've brought back, our village has a real chance to take down the Dorian and Okean before they get to us!
Vietnamese: Với thông tin bạn mang về, làng của chúng tôi có cơ hội thực sự để hạ gục Dorian và Okean trước khi chúng đến chỗ chúng tôi!

English: Go ahead and defeat as many Dorian and Okean as you can find, including their leaders! We trust you to take down the leaders, we'll be helping with the smaller ones in the back.
Vietnamese: Hãy tiếp tục và đánh bại càng nhiều Dorian và Okean mà bạn có thể tìm thấy, bao gồm cả thủ lĩnh của họ! Chúng tôi tin tưởng bạn sẽ hạ gục những kẻ dẫn đầu, chúng tôi sẽ giúp đỡ những kẻ nhỏ hơn ở phía sau.

English: If we wait too much longer the Dorian and Okean will attack the village!
Vietnamese: Nếu chúng ta đợi quá lâu thì Dorian và Okean sẽ tấn công ngôi làng!

English: It's been done, hero. We've defeated the Dorian and Okean, and can now rest easy.
Vietnamese: Đã xong rồi, anh hùng. Chúng ta đã đánh bại Dorian và Okean và giờ có thể yên tâm rồi.

English: We're doomed... without your help we will never defeat the Dorian and Okean in time!
Vietnamese: Chúng tôi sẽ phải chịu số phận... nếu không có sự giúp đỡ của bạn, chúng tôi sẽ không bao giờ đánh bại được Dorian và Okean kịp thời!

English: Collect trophies from any defeated Dorian and Okean, and defeat at least one Lord or Overlord of each!
Vietnamese: Collect trophies from any defeated Dorian and Okean, and defeat at least one Lord or Overlord of each!

English: Inky Darkness
Vietnamese: Inky Darkness

English: I hope you are ready for our final challenge hero... According to legend, once every few hundred years the Sea King will release spawn onto Coral Island.
Vietnamese: Người hùng, tôi hy vọng bạn đã sẵn sàng cho thứ thách cuối cùng của chúng ta... Theo truyền thuyết, vài trăm năm một lần, Sea King sẽ để lại trứng trên Coral Island.

English: A strange darkness has began to fill the waters of Coral Island, so it seems as if the legend is true.
Vietnamese: Một màn đêm kỳ lạ đã bắt đầu bao trùm những vùng nước của Coral Island, vì vậy có lẽ giai thoại theo truyền thuyết là thật.

English: Please help us stave off the spawn of the Sea King!
Vietnamese: Xin hãy giúp chúng tôi ngăn chặn sự sinh sôi của trứng của Sea King!

English: Thank you! Find where the Sea King has released their spawn, and defeat as many as you can. Let BoBu know once you've finished!
Vietnamese: Xin cảm ơn! Hãy tìm nơi Sea King để lại trứng và tiêu diệt nhiều trứng nhất có thể. Hãy cho BoBu biết tin ngay khi bạn đã hoàn thành nhiệm vụ!

English: Soon the inky darkness will overflow Coral Island, and we will be engulfed...
Vietnamese: Sớm thôi, màn đêm đen tối sẽ nhấn chìm Đảo San Hô và chúng ta sẽ bị nuốt chửng...

English: Hohoho! You really do have a mysterious power within you, don't you hero?
Vietnamese: Hohoho! Bên trong bạn thật sự có một sức mạnh bí ẩn, đúng không người hùng?

English: Will we become faceless like those that failed before us?
Vietnamese: Liệu chúng ta sẽ trở nên vô danh như những người đã bại trận trước đây sao?

English: Defeat 500 of any type of Kraken.
Vietnamese: Hãy đánh bại 500 Kraken bất kỳ loại nào.

English: The Sea King Returns
Vietnamese: The Sea King Returns

English: The great Sea King of Coral Island has finally returned to wreck havoc upon the land.
Vietnamese: Sea King quyền năng của Coral Island cuối cùng đã trở lại để tàn phá hòn đảo này.

English: The locals told me that getting near the beast could cause mortals to lose their mind...
Vietnamese: Người dân địa phương nói với tôi rằng tiếp cận quá gần với con quái vật có thể khiến người phàm mất trí...

English: This battle will take all the strength we can muster. If you make it out alive, go back to Darken City, and let the mayor know about all that happened here.
Vietnamese: Trận chiến này sẽ lấy hết sức mạnh mà chúng ta có thể tập hợp được. Nếu bạn còn sống sót, hãy quay lại Darken City và cho thị trưởng biết về tất cả những gì đã xảy ra ở đây.

English: The only path forward to end the curse of the Sea King is to slay the beast in its lair. Go forth and do the deed, for Coral Island!
Vietnamese: Con đường duy nhất để chấm dứt lời nguyền của Vua Biển là giết chết con quái vật trong hang ổ của nó. Hãy tiến lên và thực hiện hành động đó vì Coral Island!

English: Those who lose their mind to the Sea King are said to become faceless.
Vietnamese: Những người mất trí trước Vua Biển được cho là sẽ trở nên vô danh.

English: Welcome back from Coral Island, hero! And what a story to tell, it's true that Coral Island is a fascinating place.
Vietnamese: Chào mừng trở về từ Đảo San hô, người hùng! Thật là một câu chuyện hay để kể, sự thật là Đảo San Hô là một nơi hấp dẫn

English: BoBu and the Coral Island villagers sent something by mail for you as a way to say thanks. Perhaps they were too shy to give it to you themselves!
Vietnamese: BoBu và dân làng Đảo San hô đã gửi một thứ gì đó qua đường bưu điện cho bạn như một cách để nói lời cảm ơn. Có lẽ họ quá ngại ngùng khi tự mình đưa nó cho bạn!

English: The Sea King consumes all who look into the void.
Vietnamese: Sea King tiêu diệt tất cả những ai nhìn vào khoảng không.

English: Ultimate Crafting
Vietnamese: Ultimate Crafting

English: Orbs of Power
Vietnamese: Orbs of Power

English: Your arrival has come at a critical time, hero. Bring me Ultima, and in return I shall grant you the key to ultimate power.
Vietnamese: Sự xuất hiện của bạn đã đến vào thời điểm quan trọng, anh hùng. Hãy mang Ultima cho tôi, đổi lại tôi sẽ trao cho bạn chìa khóa của sức mạnh tối thượng.

English: Collect Ultima from the giant creatures that live on Coral Island, or from chests of plunder deep in The Wilds.
Vietnamese: Thu thập Ultima từ những sinh vật khổng lồ sống trên Đảo Coral hoặc từ các rương cướp bóc sâu trong The Wilds.

English: Without Ultima I cannot grant the ultimate power you seek.
Vietnamese: Không có Ultima tôi không thể ban cho bạn sức mạnh tối thượng mà bạn tìm kiếm.

English: Well done, hero... I bestow upon you the power of the Ultimate Orb. Combine this with Shining Oricalkum and obtain ultimate power!
Vietnamese: Làm tốt lắm, anh hùng... Tôi ban cho bạn sức mạnh của Ultimate Orb. Kết hợp điều này với Shining Oricalkum và có được sức mạnh tối thượng!

English: I need more Ultima to complete the ritual.
Vietnamese: Tôi cần thêm Ultima để hoàn thành nghi lễ

English: Collect ten Ultima from the giants of Coral Island and treasure chests in The Wilds.
Vietnamese: Thu thập mười Ultima từ những người khổng lồ của Đảo San hô và các rương kho báu trong The Wilds.

English: New Hero
Vietnamese: New Hero

English: Your will and ability have proven you to be a master in both thought and deed. Now that you've shown your true strength, it is time for your final task.
Vietnamese: Ý chí và khả năng của bạn đã chứng tỏ bạn là bậc thầy trong cả suy nghĩ và hành động. Bây giờ bạn đã thể hiện được sức mạnh thực sự của mình, đã đến lúc bạn phải thực hiện nhiệm vụ cuối cùng.

English: I need you to reach level 125 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!
Vietnamese: Tôi cần bạn đạt cấp 125 và mang về $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Chỉ có Anh hùng thực sự mới có thể làm được điều đó!

English: Reach level 125 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.
Vietnamese: Đạt cấp 125 và mang về $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.

English: New Year's Hunt
Vietnamese: New Year's Hunt

English: Celebrating 2024, let's hunt 2024 monsters!\nWhat do you say?"
Vietnamese: Kỷ niệm năm 2024, hãy săn quái vật năm 2024!\nBạn nói gì?"

English: "Great! I know you'll make it for sure!\nHere's to a new year full of adventures in 2024!!!"
Vietnamese: "Tuyệt vời! Tôi biết bạn chắc chắn sẽ làm được!\nĐây là một năm mới đầy phiêu lưu vào năm 2024!!!"

English: "It's a shame, because I've got the best New Year's gift ever…"
Vietnamese: "Thật đáng tiếc, vì tôi đã nhận được món quà năm mới tuyệt vời nhất từ ​​trước đến nay..."

English: "You've done great~ Here's your New Year's gift~\nLet's see how lucky you are this year!!!"
Vietnamese: "Bạn đã làm rất tốt~ Đây là quà năm mới của bạn~\nHãy xem năm nay bạn may mắn đến mức nào!!!"

English: "Are you still a long way off? We're running out of time! Please hurry up!"
Vietnamese: "Bạn vẫn còn chặng đường dài phải không? Chúng ta không còn nhiều thời gian nữa! Hãy nhanh lên!"

English: Defeat the monsters and return to Auxilior.
Vietnamese: Đánh bại lũ quái vật và trở về Auxilior.

English: Collecting Candy Shells
Vietnamese: Collecting Candy Shells

English: Madrigal is being polluted by discarded candy shells everywhere!! We need your help!!
Vietnamese: Madrigal is being polluted by discarded candy shells everywhere!! We need your help!!

English: Thank you so much!! I won't forget your help!!
Vietnamese: Thank you so much!! I won't forget your help!!

English: I have a special gift for you, but it's a shame...
Vietnamese: I have a special gift for you, but it's a shame...

English: I'm so proud to see Madrigal cleaned up~!
Vietnamese: I'm so proud to see Madrigal cleaned up~!

English: Hang in there!!
Vietnamese: Hang in there!!

English: Collect the candy shells and return to Auxilior.
Vietnamese: Collect the candy shells and return to Auxilior.

English: Spring Monster Ball
Vietnamese: Spring Monster Ball

English: Hello Adventurer! Would you like to take a suggestion about hunting a stronger monster?
Vietnamese: Hello Adventurer! Would you like to take a suggestion about hunting a stronger monster?

English: Great! Show me what you can do first!
Vietnamese: Great! Show me what you can do first!

English: That's too bad, please join us next time!
Vietnamese: That's too bad, please join us next time!

English: Thank you. Here is your Monster Ball. Please be cautious!\nNo one knows what kind of powerful monster will come out.
Vietnamese: Thank you. Here is your Monster Ball. Please be cautious!\nNo one knows what kind of powerful monster will come out.

English: Are we there yet? We don't have much time.
Vietnamese: Are we there yet? We don't have much time.

English: Complete all 3 missions.
Vietnamese: Complete all 3 missions.

English: Couple Ring Hunt
Vietnamese: Couple Ring Hunt

English: If you bring me the coupling, I will give you something really good. Go get it.
Vietnamese: If you bring me the coupling, I will give you something really good. Go get it.

English: Thanks for granting my request. I've heard through the grapevine that there's been a lot of frauds playing with fake couple rings lately, so you'd better be careful.
Vietnamese: Thanks for granting my request. I've heard through the grapevine that there's been a lot of frauds playing with fake couple rings lately, so you'd better be careful.

English: What? Where in the world is such a couple ring? So you're saying I'm lying? If you don't believe me, get off!
Vietnamese: What? Where in the world is such a couple ring? So you're saying I'm lying? If you don't believe me, get off!

English: Did you manage to get the couple ring already? This is a fake! Didn't I warn you not to get scammed. But I'm giving it to you for your efforts, so take it.
Vietnamese: Did you manage to get the couple ring already? This is a fake! Didn't I warn you not to get scammed. But I'm giving it to you for your efforts, so take it.

English: Still haven't found the coupling? Hmm...well, that could be... I mean, where would a legendary couple ring be so easy to find?
Vietnamese: Still haven't found the coupling? Hmm...well, that could be... I mean, where would a legendary couple ring be so easy to find?

English: Hunt the monsters and gather couple rings!
Vietnamese: Hunt the monsters and gather couple rings!

English: Roll your dice
Vietnamese: Roll your dice

English: Complete all missions.
Vietnamese: Complete all missions.

English: Couple Daily Quests
Vietnamese: Couple Daily Quests

English: Hunt the monsters and gather couple rings!
Vietnamese: Hunt the monsters and gather couple rings!

English: I'm so glad to see how in love you are. Go collect $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ from the Nyangnyangs in northern Flaris, then return to me.
Vietnamese: I'm so glad to see how in love you are. Go collect $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ from the Nyangnyangs in northern Flaris, then return to me.

English: I can feel these charms emitting love waves. Soon everyone will know how special your love is!
Vietnamese: I can feel these charms emitting love waves. Soon everyone will know how special your love is!

English: I'm sorry, were you unable to find the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$? Perhaps they only appear for those truly in love.
Vietnamese: I'm sorry, were you unable to find the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$? Perhaps they only appear for those truly in love.

English: Bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me to prove the strength of your love!
Vietnamese: Bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me to prove the strength of your love!

English: Kill Demian Thieves
Vietnamese: Kill Demian Thieves

English: Welcome! Another request has come in to clear out $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$. Could you please work together to defeat the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, and return to me once you are done?
Vietnamese: Welcome! Another request has come in to clear out $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$. Could you please work together to defeat the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, and return to me once you are done?

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted somewhere in Madrigal. Check your map for hints for where they may be hiding!
Vietnamese: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted somewhere in Madrigal. Check your map for hints for where they may be hiding!

English: The power of your love have vanquished the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ threat, thank you!
Vietnamese: The power of your love have vanquished the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ threat, thank you!

English: Were you unable to find and defeat $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ yet? Track them down to prove your love is true!
Vietnamese: Were you unable to find and defeat $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ yet? Track them down to prove your love is true!

English: Find Love Fish
Vietnamese: Find Love Fish

English: Have you heard of the legendary $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$? Legend has it that lovers who obtain the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ will be together forever.
Vietnamese: Have you heard of the legendary $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$? Legend has it that lovers who obtain the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ will be together forever.

English: Wonderful! The $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ is said to swim near Zaoma's Refuge in the middle of the Leren Mountains.
Vietnamese: Wonderful! The $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ is said to swim near Zaoma's Refuge in the middle of the Leren Mountains.

English: You've found the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$! Surely your love will be blessed to last forever.
Vietnamese: You've found the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$! Surely your love will be blessed to last forever.

English: I don't see the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. If you have trouble finding it, search near Zaoma in the Leren Mountains.
Vietnamese: I don't see the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. If you have trouble finding it, search near Zaoma in the Leren Mountains.

English: Bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me to prove the strength of your love!
Vietnamese: Bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me to prove the strength of your love!

English: Kill Giggleboxes
Vietnamese: Kill Giggleboxes

English: Kill Trangfoma
Vietnamese: Kill Trangfoma

English: Kill Doridoma
Vietnamese: Kill Doridoma

English: Kill Scorpicon
Vietnamese: Kill Scorpicon

English: Kill Tombstone Bearer
Vietnamese: Kill Tombstone Bearer

English: Kill Cardpuppets
Vietnamese: Kill Cardpuppets

English: Kill Steam Walkers
Vietnamese: Kill Steam Walkers

English: Kill Nutty Wheels
Vietnamese: Kill Nutty Wheels

English: Kill Fefern
Vietnamese: Kill Fefern

English: Kill Wagsaac
Vietnamese: Kill Wagsaac

English: Kill Prankster
Vietnamese: Kill Prankster

English: Collect Whispering Leaves from Risem
Vietnamese: Collect Whispering Leaves from Risem

English: In their spare time, Risems collect leaves that whisper sweet nothings. Spread love around Madrigal by bringing these $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me!
Vietnamese: In their spare time, Risems collect leaves that whisper sweet nothings. Spread love around Madrigal by bringing these $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me!

English: I'm so glad to see how in love you are. Go collect $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ from the Risems in Darken, then return to me.
Vietnamese: I'm so glad to see how in love you are. Go collect $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ from the Risems in Darken, then return to me.

English: Can you hear the leaves speak? Soon everyone will know how special your love is!
Vietnamese: Can you hear the leaves speak? Soon everyone will know how special your love is!

English: A Date on Mars!
Vietnamese: A Date on Mars!

English: What could be more romantic than frolicking near the Bangs of Northern Flaris? A picnic outside of Mars Mine sounds outstanding!
Vietnamese: What could be more romantic than frolicking near the Bangs of Northern Flaris? A picnic outside of Mars Mine sounds outstanding!

English: Wonderful, then the date is set. Enjoy your time sightseeing at the Mars Mine!
Vietnamese: Wonderful, then the date is set. Enjoy your time sightseeing at the Mars Mine!

English: Not a fan of Bangs? Well, there's always the Nyangnyangs.
Vietnamese: Not a fan of Bangs? Well, there's always the Nyangnyangs.

English: How was the date? Hopefully the Bangs weren't too distracting.
Vietnamese: How was the date? Hopefully the Bangs weren't too distracting.

English: Oh, so the Bangs were too distracting after all. Maybe you need to take a cold bath?
Vietnamese: Oh, so the Bangs were too distracting after all. Maybe you need to take a cold bath?

English: Go on a romantic date outside the entrance of Mars Mine!
Vietnamese: Go on a romantic date outside the entrance of Mars Mine!

English: Welcome! Another request has come in to clear out $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$. Could you please slay the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, and return to me once you are done?
Vietnamese: Welcome! Another request has come in to clear out $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$. Could you please slay the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, and return to me once you are done?

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted somewhere in Madrigal.
Vietnamese: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted somewhere in Madrigal.

English: Some days we don't feel productive. I understand.
Vietnamese: Some days we don't feel productive. I understand.

English: Collect Rainbow Flowers
Vietnamese: Collect Rainbow Flowers

English: Welcome! We require flowers blessed by lovers. Could you please collect Rainbow Flowers, and return to me once you are done?
Vietnamese: Welcome! We require flowers blessed by lovers. Could you please collect Rainbow Flowers, and return to me once you are done?

English: Wonderful! The rare flowers grow near the large tree in Saint Morning where no one flies.
Vietnamese: Wonderful! The rare flowers grow near the large tree in Saint Morning where no one flies.

English: These flowers are perfect. With your help I can now bless all of Madrigal with love!
Vietnamese: These flowers are perfect. With your help I can now bless all of Madrigal with love!

English: Oh no, that's not right. The flowers are in Saint Morning. If you get lost, remember to check your map!
Vietnamese: Oh no, that's not right. The flowers are in Saint Morning. If you get lost, remember to check your map!

English: Head to the Plateau of Silence in Saint Morning, and retrieve the Wild Rainbow Flowers.
Vietnamese: Head to the Plateau of Silence in Saint Morning, and retrieve the Wild Rainbow Flowers.

English: Collect Heart Charms from Nyangnyang
Vietnamese: Collect Heart Charms from Nyangnyang

English: Nyangnyangs possess charms bursting with the power of love. With a few of these charms, you can show Madrigal how strong your love is!
Vietnamese: Nyangnyangs possess charms bursting with the power of love. With a few of these charms, you can show Madrigal how strong your love is!

English: The Mystery of the Shady Eye
Vietnamese: The Mystery of the Shady Eye

English: The Mystery of the Shady Eye (2)
Vietnamese: The Mystery of the Shady Eye (2)

English: The Cursed Wing of Destiny
Vietnamese: The Cursed Wing of Destiny

English: The Cursed Wing of Destiny (2)
Vietnamese: The Cursed Wing of Destiny (2)

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the sixth floor of the Forsaken Tower.
Vietnamese: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the sixth floor of the Forsaken Tower.

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the seventh floor of the Forsaken Tower.
Vietnamese: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the seventh floor of the Forsaken Tower.

Vietnamese: Disarming the Maleficars

English: Disarming the Maleficars (2)
Vietnamese: Disarming the Maleficars (2)

Vietnamese: Stealing gems from the cursed guardian

English: Stealing gems from the cursed guardian (2)
Vietnamese: Stealing gems from the cursed guardian (2)

English: Herbology Class
Vietnamese: Herbology Class

English: You can gather herbs with a hoe. Want to learn how to gather herbs?
Vietnamese: You can gather herbs with a hoe. Want to learn how to gather herbs?

English: Good. Then go out into the field and try to gather some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Vietnamese: Good. Then go out into the field and try to gather some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: There you go. It's easier than you think, isn't it? Just remember, the most important thing is to do 'a lot'.
Vietnamese: There you go. It's easier than you think, isn't it? Just remember, the most important thing is to do 'a lot'.

English: Woodcutting Class
Vietnamese: Woodcutting Class

English: You can chop trees with an axe. Would you like to learn woodcutting?
Vietnamese: You can chop trees with an axe. Would you like to learn woodcutting?

English: Good. Then go out into the field and chop some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Vietnamese: Good. Then go out into the field and chop some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: Mining Class
Vietnamese: Mining Class

English: You can dig up ores with a pickaxe. Would you like to learn mining?
Vietnamese: You can dig up ores with a pickaxe. Would you like to learn mining?

English: Good. Then go out into the field and try to dig some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Vietnamese: Good. Then go out into the field and try to dig some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: Fishing Class
Vietnamese: Fishing Class

English: Once you get to know thrill of fishing, it's hard to get away from it. What do you say, learn?
Vietnamese: Once you get to know thrill of fishing, it's hard to get away from it. What do you say, learn?

English: Good. Then go to the nearest river and try fishing. Whether you succeed or fail, it'll help you a lot.
Vietnamese: Good. Then go to the nearest river and try fishing. Whether you succeed or fail, it'll help you a lot.

English: Alchemy Class
Vietnamese: Alchemy Class

English: Once you learn the alchemy, you can brew your own buff potion to carry with. Want to learn?
Vietnamese: Once you learn the alchemy, you can brew your own buff potion to carry with. Want to learn?

English: Good. Try anything on the caldron nearby. Caldron is near the magic shop.
Vietnamese: Good. Try anything on the caldron nearby. Caldron is near the magic shop.

English: Cooking Class
Vietnamese: Cooking Class

English: Food is the basic of survival. Why don't you cook on your own?
Vietnamese: Food is the basic of survival. Why don't you cook on your own?

English: Good. Try anything on the oven nearby. Oven is near the food shop.
Vietnamese: Good. Try anything on the oven nearby. Oven is near the food shop.

English: Carpentry Class
Vietnamese: Carpentry Class

English: You can make furniture out of wood. Would you like to learn carpenting?
Vietnamese: You can make furniture out of wood. Would you like to learn carpenting?

English: Okay, try anything on the woodcutting tools nearby. The woodcutting tools are near the Housing Manager.
Vietnamese: Okay, try anything on the woodcutting tools nearby. The woodcutting tools are near the Housing Manager.

English: Smithing Class
Vietnamese: Smithing Class

English: You can make furniture out of wood. Would you like to learn carpenting?
Vietnamese: You can make furniture out of wood. Would you like to learn carpenting?

English: Okay, try anything at the nearest crafting tool. The tools are near the jewelry.
Vietnamese: Okay, try anything at the nearest crafting tool. The tools are near the jewelry.

English: Destroy the pumpkins 1
Vietnamese: Destroy the pumpkins 1

English: Complete the mission.
Vietnamese: Complete the mission.

English: Destroy the pumpkins 2
Vietnamese: Destroy the pumpkins 2

English: Complete the mission.
Vietnamese: Complete the mission.

English: Thanksgiving Turkey
Vietnamese: Thanksgiving Turkey

English: Help the mayor cook his turkey for thanksgiving.\nHunt monsters (Lv. -10 to Lv. +10 from your level) to earn [Event] Turkeys.
Vietnamese: Help the mayor cook his turkey for thanksgiving.\nHunt monsters (Lv. -10 to Lv. +10 from your level) to earn [Event] Turkeys.

English: Hello, adventurer! I'm planning to cook a turkey for the village. Do you have a moment to help?
Vietnamese: Hello, adventurer! I'm planning to cook a turkey for the village. Do you have a moment to help?

English: Great! Actually, I tried to cook it myself, but while I left the ingredients outside, monsters stole them all! Can you help me get them back?
Vietnamese: Great! Actually, I tried to cook it myself, but while I left the ingredients outside, monsters stole them all! Can you help me get them back?

English: That's a shame. I'll try to figure something out on my own.
Vietnamese: That's a shame. I'll try to figure something out on my own.

English: Thank you so much! I can finish cooking in time. Happy Thanksgiving!
Vietnamese: Thank you so much! I can finish cooking in time. Happy Thanksgiving!

English: Are you done yet? The villagers are eagerly waiting!
Vietnamese: Are you done yet? The villagers are eagerly waiting!

English: Go out into the field and try to gather some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Vietnamese: Go out into the field and try to gather some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: Go out into the field and chop some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Vietnamese: Go out into the field and chop some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: Go out into the field and try to dig some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Vietnamese: Go out into the field and try to dig some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: Go to the nearest river and try fishing. Whether you succeed or fail, it'll help you a lot.
Vietnamese: Go to the nearest river and try fishing. Whether you succeed or fail, it'll help you a lot.

English: Try anything on the caldron nearby. Caldron is near the magic shop.
Vietnamese: Try anything on the caldron nearby. Caldron is near the magic shop.

English: Try anything on the oven nearby. Oven is near the food shop.
Vietnamese: Try anything on the oven nearby. Oven is near the food shop.

English: Try anything on the woodcutting tools nearby. The woodcutting tools are near the Housing Manager.
Vietnamese: Try anything on the woodcutting tools nearby. The woodcutting tools are near the Housing Manager.

English: Try anything at the nearest crafting tool. The tools are near the jewelry.
Vietnamese: Try anything at the nearest crafting tool. The tools are near the jewelry.

English: Hero Grade (2)
Vietnamese: Hero Grade (2)

English: I need you to reach level 140 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!
Vietnamese: I need you to reach level 140 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!

English: Reach level 140 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.
Vietnamese: Reach level 140 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.

English: Hero Grade (3)
Vietnamese: Hero Grade (3)

English: I need you to reach level 160 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!
Vietnamese: I need you to reach level 160 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!

English: Reach level 160 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.
Vietnamese: Reach level 160 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.

English: Rumble from the Depths
Vietnamese: Rumble from the Depths

English: (H-Hiii…!) T-tremors... w-waves... taller than a Clockworks... (Gulp) A... a deafening noise... Wh-what’s going on?!
Vietnamese: (H-Hiii…!) T-tremors... w-waves... taller than a Clockworks... (Gulp) A... a deafening noise... Wh-what’s going on?!

English: What?! You’re not aware??! But where have you been?! Honestly… We can never count on you to keep an eye on our precious world…
Vietnamese: What?! You’re not aware??! But where have you been?! Honestly… We can never count on you to keep an eye on our precious world…

English: Well… listen. It doesn’t matter, I’ll need you. I have no idea what happened, or even where exactly… (hesitation) But I feel like the deafening noise came from the Krakens side.
Vietnamese: Well… listen. It doesn’t matter, I’ll need you. I have no idea what happened, or even where exactly… (hesitation) But I feel like the deafening noise came from the Krakens side.

English: I would have gone myself, but you see… (looking away) I still have a lot to do, and there are other adventurers I need to take care of… (coughs) And don’t think I’m scared, okay! It has nothing to do with that, absolutely nothing!
Vietnamese: I would have gone myself, but you see… (looking away) I still have a lot to do, and there are other adventurers I need to take care of… (coughs) And don’t think I’m scared, okay! It has nothing to do with that, absolutely nothing!

English: Find the location of the events and see what’s happening there
Vietnamese: Find the location of the events and see what’s happening there

English: Ah! Finally, someone reliable! I knew I could count on you. Go quickly, check near the Krakens side, and come back to tell me what you find. I’m sure you’ll do an excellent job! But… be careful, alright? That rumble wasn’t normal...
Vietnamese: Ah! Finally, someone reliable! I knew I could count on you. Go quickly, check near the Krakens side, and come back to tell me what you find. I’m sure you’ll do an excellent job! But… be careful, alright? That rumble wasn’t normal...

English: What?! You’re not going?! Really… We can’t count on anyone… Fine, do as you wish, but remember that this world needs protectors, not cowards. And don’t come complaining if things get worse without you!
Vietnamese: What?! You’re not going?! Really… We can’t count on anyone… Fine, do as you wish, but remember that this world needs protectors, not cowards. And don’t come complaining if things get worse without you!

English: Starfish… coral… and all kinds of little sea things coming together to form… a portal?! This is insane… How could this be possible?!
Vietnamese: Starfish… coral… and all kinds of little sea things coming together to form… a portal?! This is insane… How could this be possible?!

English: You’re back already? But… don’t tell me you haven’t checked out the source of that noise yet! We need to know what’s happening on the Krakens side. Go on, get moving! The world’s not going to protect itself, you know!
Vietnamese: You’re back already? But… don’t tell me you haven’t checked out the source of that noise yet! We need to know what’s happening on the Krakens side. Go on, get moving! The world’s not going to protect itself, you know!

English: Magic water stone of Herneos
Vietnamese: Magic water stone of Herneos

English: Hmm… If what you’re telling me is true, it would correspond to a well-known legend of Madrigal… Once upon a time, in the Old World, Herneos was a prosperous city where everyone dreamed of living, a true underwater paradise with magnificent architecture.
Vietnamese: Hmm… If what you’re telling me is true, it would correspond to a well-known legend of Madrigal… Once upon a time, in the Old World, Herneos was a prosperous city where everyone dreamed of living, a true underwater paradise with magnificent architecture.

English: But one day, Shade pierced the glass bubble that protected Herneos from the depths of the ocean, and the city sank… along with its inhabitants. Since then, despite numerous searches, we have never found this lost city. But if you’re telling me a portal has opened…
Vietnamese: But one day, Shade pierced the glass bubble that protected Herneos from the depths of the ocean, and the city sank… along with its inhabitants. Since then, despite numerous searches, we have never found this lost city. But if you’re telling me a portal has opened…

English: I’m afraid Shade has finally found a way to return to the city of Herneos… For what purpose? I have no idea, but we need to ensure it is indeed the city of Herneos…
Vietnamese: I’m afraid Shade has finally found a way to return to the city of Herneos… For what purpose? I have no idea, but we need to ensure it is indeed the city of Herneos…

English: Bring back a magical water stone from the discovered location and have it analyzed by Dr. Estly
Vietnamese: Bring back a magical water stone from the discovered location and have it analyzed by Dr. Estly

English: Ah, thank you! I knew you’d understand the urgency. If this really is a magical water stone from Herneos, then Shade’s reach might be spreading in ways we never expected… Please, bring back a stone as soon as you can. And be careful Herneos may be more dangerous now than we imagine.
Vietnamese: Ah, thank you! I knew you’d understand the urgency. If this really is a magical water stone from Herneos, then Shade’s reach might be spreading in ways we never expected… Please, bring back a stone as soon as you can. And be careful Herneos may be more dangerous now than we imagine.

English: What?! You’re not interested in helping with this? You don’t understand this isn’t just some small errand! Herneos could be the key to untold mysteries… and maybe even threats. But fine, if you can’t be bothered, I’ll just have to find someone else…
Vietnamese: What?! You’re not interested in helping with this? You don’t understand this isn’t just some small errand! Herneos could be the key to untold mysteries… and maybe even threats. But fine, if you can’t be bothered, I’ll just have to find someone else…

English: Ah, you've returned with the magical water stone! Thank you! I'll begin the analysis right away to confirm its origin.
Vietnamese: Ah, you've returned with the magical water stone! Thank you! I'll begin the analysis right away to confirm its origin.

English: Back so soon? You don’t have the magical water stone yet? We’re counting on that stone to prove if it’s truly from Herneos. Shade’s power might be stronger than we thought, so time is crucial. Please, return as soon as you have it!
Vietnamese: Back so soon? You don’t have the magical water stone yet? We’re counting on that stone to prove if it’s truly from Herneos. Shade’s power might be stronger than we thought, so time is crucial. Please, return as soon as you have it!

English: Under Shade's Command
Vietnamese: Under Shade's Command

English: What?! Monsters? Whole hordes?! Listen… Shade must already be at work, and if she’s there, she won’t waste any time.
Vietnamese: What?! Monsters? Whole hordes?! Listen… Shade must already be at work, and if she’s there, she won’t waste any time.

English: I’ll need you to return there. Observe, fight, assess their strengths… If these creatures are really under Shade’s control, we need to know what awaits us.
Vietnamese: I’ll need you to return there. Observe, fight, assess their strengths… If these creatures are really under Shade’s control, we need to know what awaits us.

English: When you’ve dealt with the monsters, return to see Dr. Estly. He should have finished the analysis of the water by then, and we’ll finally know if this submerged city is indeed Herneos…
Vietnamese: When you’ve dealt with the monsters, return to see Dr. Estly. He should have finished the analysis of the water by then, and we’ll finally know if this submerged city is indeed Herneos…

English: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s, $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT,2$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,2$s, $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT,3$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,3$s and return talk to Sovann.
Vietnamese: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s, $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT,2$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,2$s, $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT,3$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,3$s and return talk to Sovann.

English: Excellent! I knew I could count on you. The creatures under Shade’s command won’t go down easily, but with your skills, I’m confident you can handle them. Go, and show them that we won’t back down! Once you've dealt with them, check back with Sovann.
Vietnamese: Excellent! I knew I could count on you. The creatures under Shade’s command won’t go down easily, but with your skills, I’m confident you can handle them. Go, and show them that we won’t back down! Once you've dealt with them, check back with Sovann.

English: What?! You’re refusing?! Don’t you see how serious this is? Shade’s forces won’t stop they’ll only get stronger if we ignore them. Fine, if you’re not willing to help, I’ll find someone who is up to the challenge. But don’t forget you might regret standing by if Shade succeeds.
Vietnamese: What?! You’re refusing?! Don’t you see how serious this is? Shade’s forces won’t stop they’ll only get stronger if we ignore them. Fine, if you’re not willing to help, I’ll find someone who is up to the challenge. But don’t forget you might regret standing by if Shade succeeds.

English: You’re back again? But… have you not dealt with those monsters yet? We need to know what we’re up against! Shade’s forces are growing stronger every moment you delay. Go back and finish the job! Time is of the essence, and the fate of Herneos depends on it!
Vietnamese: You’re back again? But… have you not dealt with those monsters yet? We need to know what we’re up against! Shade’s forces are growing stronger every moment you delay. Go back and finish the job! Time is of the essence, and the fate of Herneos depends on it!

English: You did it! I knew you could handle those monsters! Thank you for stepping up when we needed it the most.
Vietnamese: You did it! I knew you could handle those monsters! Thank you for stepping up when we needed it the most.

English: Seeking the Truth of Herneos
Vietnamese: Seeking the Truth of Herneos

English: I’m afraid I don’t have the knowledge necessary to interpret the results correctly.
Vietnamese: I’m afraid I don’t have the knowledge necessary to interpret the results correctly.

English: Listen, take this sample and bring it to Martinyc the historian of Flarine. Only she has the archives and the skills to compare and tell you what’s going on! If this water is really connected to Herneos, she’ll know.
Vietnamese: Listen, take this sample and bring it to Martinyc the historian of Flarine. Only she has the archives and the skills to compare and tell you what’s going on! If this water is really connected to Herneos, she’ll know.

English: Take the analysis result to Martinyc the historian of Flarine
Vietnamese: Take the analysis result to Martinyc the historian of Flarine

English: Thank you! I knew you’d understand the importance of this. Martinyc is our best hope for interpreting these results. Take the sample to her right away, and let’s hope she can shed some light on this mystery! The fate of Herneos could depend on it!
Vietnamese: Thank you! I knew you’d understand the importance of this. Martinyc is our best hope for interpreting these results. Take the sample to her right away, and let’s hope she can shed some light on this mystery! The fate of Herneos could depend on it!

English: What? You’re turning this down? This is vital information that could unlock the secrets of Herneos! If you won’t help now, I don’t know what we’ll do. Fine, but don’t forget that knowledge is power, and you might regret passing on this opportunity!
Vietnamese: What? You’re turning this down? This is vital information that could unlock the secrets of Herneos! If you won’t help now, I don’t know what we’ll do. Fine, but don’t forget that knowledge is power, and you might regret passing on this opportunity!

English: You’re back? But… have you not delivered the sample to Martinyc yet? We need her expertise to understand what the analysis reveals! Time is running out, and if this water is connected to Herneos, we need to act quickly. Go now, before it’s too late!
Vietnamese: You’re back? But… have you not delivered the sample to Martinyc yet? We need her expertise to understand what the analysis reveals! Time is running out, and if this water is connected to Herneos, we need to act quickly. Go now, before it’s too late!

English: Trophies from the Depths
Vietnamese: Trophies from the Depths

English: Hello, who are you?... Oh, you must be the adventurer Estly told me about! Nice to meet you. How can I assist you?
Vietnamese: Hello, who are you?... Oh, you must be the adventurer Estly told me about! Nice to meet you. How can I assist you?

English: Oh, you want me to interpret the results of this analysis to check, using the archives, if this water is indeed from the city of Herneos?
Vietnamese: Oh, you want me to interpret the results of this analysis to check, using the archives, if this water is indeed from the city of Herneos?

English: (Smirking) But nothing comes for free, you know! I heard there are all-new monsters, never seen before, over there…
Vietnamese: (Smirking) But nothing comes for free, you know! I heard there are all-new monsters, never seen before, over there…

English: While I compare the results, could you bring me samples or souvenirs from each creature? That would allow me to enrich our archives on these strange appearances.
Vietnamese: While I compare the results, could you bring me samples or souvenirs from each creature? That would allow me to enrich our archives on these strange appearances.

English: Bring back $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$, $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,2$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME,2$, $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,3$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME,3$
Vietnamese: Bring back $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$, $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,2$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME,2$, $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,3$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME,3$

English: Ah, wonderful! I knew you’d be up for the task. These new creatures are unlike anything we've documented, so any samples you bring will be invaluable. While you’re collecting them, I’ll start the comparison. Come back once you have the items, and we’ll see what these archives reveal about Herneos.
Vietnamese: Ah, wonderful! I knew you’d be up for the task. These new creatures are unlike anything we've documented, so any samples you bring will be invaluable. While you’re collecting them, I’ll start the comparison. Come back once you have the items, and we’ll see what these archives reveal about Herneos.

English: Really? You’re refusing? (Sighs) I suppose not everyone appreciates the importance of history… But fine, go ahead just remember that these discoveries are rare. Who knows if you'll get another chance to contribute to our knowledge of Herneos.
Vietnamese: Really? You’re refusing? (Sighs) I suppose not everyone appreciates the importance of history… But fine, go ahead just remember that these discoveries are rare. Who knows if you'll get another chance to contribute to our knowledge of Herneos.

English: Ohhh, thank you for these souvenirs! I can finally… continue my collection... uh, enrich the city archives! (clears throat) Yes, of course, the archives!
Vietnamese: Ohhh, thank you for these souvenirs! I can finally… continue my collection... uh, enrich the city archives! (clears throat) Yes, of course, the archives!

English: Ah, you’re back? But… I don’t see any of the samples I asked for. These souvenirs from the creatures are essential to my research, you know! Please, gather them quickly and return. The archives await your findings!
Vietnamese: Ah, you’re back? But… I don’t see any of the samples I asked for. These souvenirs from the creatures are essential to my research, you know! Please, gather them quickly and return. The archives await your findings!

English: Unveiling Herneos
Vietnamese: Unveiling Herneos

English: Ah, yes, the analysis results… So, according to our archives, the water you retrieved matches 100% with that of the city of Herneos! It is indeed it You should quickly go announce this news to Sovann !
Vietnamese: Ah, yes, the analysis results… So, according to our archives, the water you retrieved matches 100% with that of the city of Herneos! It is indeed it You should quickly go announce this news to Sovann !

English: Go tell Sovann it is indeed Herneos
Vietnamese: Go tell Sovann it is indeed Herneos

English: Fantastic! Thank you so much for delivering the news. Sovann will be thrilled or perhaps a bit anxious to hear it. Go quickly and let him know that Herneos has indeed resurfaced. We might be on the brink of something monumental!
Vietnamese: Fantastic! Thank you so much for delivering the news. Sovann will be thrilled or perhaps a bit anxious to hear it. Go quickly and let him know that Herneos has indeed resurfaced. We might be on the brink of something monumental!

English: Wait… you’re not going to tell him? This is crucial information! Herneos is real, and Sovann needs to know. Fine, if you won’t go, but don’t say I didn’t warn you… Discoveries like this don’t come every day, and neither does the chance to be part of history.
Vietnamese: Wait… you’re not going to tell him? This is crucial information! Herneos is real, and Sovann needs to know. Fine, if you won’t go, but don’t say I didn’t warn you… Discoveries like this don’t come every day, and neither does the chance to be part of history.

English: What?? It’s really the lost city of Herneos?! (in awe) It’s incredible to see this iconic city again!
Vietnamese: What?? It’s really the lost city of Herneos?! (in awe) It’s incredible to see this iconic city again!

English: Oh, you’re back… but you still haven’t told Sovann? This is monumental news... Herneos has been confirmed! Please, don’t delay any longer. Sovann must hear this right away; the implications are too important to keep to ourselves!
Vietnamese: Oh, you’re back… but you still haven’t told Sovann? This is monumental news... Herneos has been confirmed! Please, don’t delay any longer. Sovann must hear this right away; the implications are too important to keep to ourselves!

English: Herneos: The Golden Legacy
Vietnamese: Herneos: The Golden Legacy

English: Listen, you should check if the treasure is still there! What treasure?! The treasure of Herneos, of course! You can’t miss it: gold, jewels, valuable items... a true legend!
Vietnamese: Listen, you should check if the treasure is still there! What treasure?! The treasure of Herneos, of course! You can’t miss it: gold, jewels, valuable items... a true legend!

English: So, what are you waiting for? Hurry before Shade gets her hands on it!
Vietnamese: So, what are you waiting for? Hurry before Shade gets her hands on it!

English: Check if the treasure is still there
Vietnamese: Check if the treasure is still there

English: Yes! I knew you wouldn’t pass up a chance like this. The treasure of Herneos is the stuff of legends if it’s still there, it could be a discovery of a lifetime! Go quickly, and make sure you get there before Shade does. Good luck!
Vietnamese: Yes! I knew you wouldn’t pass up a chance like this. The treasure of Herneos is the stuff of legends if it’s still there, it could be a discovery of a lifetime! Go quickly, and make sure you get there before Shade does. Good luck!

English: You’re… refusing? Are you serious?! This is the legendary treasure of Herneos! Opportunities like this don’t come around twice, you know. Fine, but don’t say I didn’t give you the chance to be part of something unforgettable.
Vietnamese: You’re… refusing? Are you serious?! This is the legendary treasure of Herneos! Opportunities like this don’t come around twice, you know. Fine, but don’t say I didn’t give you the chance to be part of something unforgettable.

English: The treasure is still there?! Great news! But… it’s possible that all is not lost, if we act quickly. Very quickly.
Vietnamese: The treasure is still there?! Great news! But… it’s possible that all is not lost, if we act quickly. Very quickly.

English: Cutting Shade's Power
Vietnamese: Cutting Shade's Power

English: I know it’s a lot to ask, but… could you start by eliminating the two generals of Shade’s army that you spotted in Herneos? (determined look) That should slow down Shade’s advance and considerably weaken her right hand.
Vietnamese: I know it’s a lot to ask, but… could you start by eliminating the two generals of Shade’s army that you spotted in Herneos? (determined look) That should slow down Shade’s advance and considerably weaken her right hand.

English: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ & $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,2$ the two generals of Shade at Herneos
Vietnamese: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ & $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,2$ the two generals of Shade at Herneos

English: Thank you! With Shade’s generals out of the way, we might actually stand a chance. I know it won’t be easy, but you’re the only one who can do it. Go now, and show them that we won’t let Herneos fall under Shade’s control!
Vietnamese: Thank you! With Shade’s generals out of the way, we might actually stand a chance. I know it won’t be easy, but you’re the only one who can do it. Go now, and show them that we won’t let Herneos fall under Shade’s control!

English: What?! You’re backing out now? This is no time for hesitation! Shade’s forces are closing in, and without your help, we may not be able to hold them back. But fine, if you won’t act, we’ll have to hope someone else is up for the challenge…
Vietnamese: What?! You’re backing out now? This is no time for hesitation! Shade’s forces are closing in, and without your help, we may not be able to hold them back. But fine, if you won’t act, we’ll have to hope someone else is up for the challenge…

English: What?! You did it already?! (beaming smile) I can’t believe it! It’s incredible to count on you. You’re our true savior!
Vietnamese: What?! You did it already?! (beaming smile) I can’t believe it! It’s incredible to count on you. You’re our true savior!

English: You’re back... but the two generals of Shade are still standing? Every moment they’re left unchecked, Herneos is at greater risk. We’re counting on you to stop them. There’s no time to lose!
Vietnamese: You’re back... but the two generals of Shade are still standing? Every moment they’re left unchecked, Herneos is at greater risk. We’re counting on you to stop them. There’s no time to lose!

English: The Final Battle for Herneos
Vietnamese: The Final Battle for Herneos

English: Now that you’ve weakened the boss by taking out the two generals of Shade’s army, it would be wise for you to face her right hand before he regains his full power.
Vietnamese: Now that you’ve weakened the boss by taking out the two generals of Shade’s army, it would be wise for you to face her right hand before he regains his full power.
